content: this is a small beginner-friendly doily made with a lightweight 100% mercerized cotton yarn category 2 such as yarnart begonia yarn and a 3 5 mm hook the doily is easy and quick to make and requires only a small amount of cotton yarn you can finish it in about an hour free video tutorial https //www youtube com/watch v=g01ka6nmvly free written pattern https //lacycrochet blogspot com/2025/05/easy-crochet-doily-for-beginners-no html
